# serval_workflow_run (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_workflow_run" "example_workflow_run" {
  id = "id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the workflow run.

### Read-Only

- `completed_at` (String) The timestamp when the workflow run completed (if applicable).
- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the workflow run was created.
- `initiated_by_user_id` (String) The ID of the user who initiated the workflow run.
- `inputs` (String) The inputs provided to the workflow (JSON string).
- `linked_ticket_id` (String) The ID of the linked ticket, if any.
- `output` (String) The output of the workflow run (JSON string, available when completed or failed).
- `status` (String) The status of the workflow run.
Available values: "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED", "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_PENDING", "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_RUNNING", "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_COMPLETED", "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_FAILED", "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_DENIED", "WORKFLOW_RUN_STATUS_CANCELED".
- `target_user_id` (String) The ID of the target user for the workflow run (if different from initiator).
- `team_id` (String) The ID of the team that the workflow belongs to.
- `workflow_id` (String) The ID of the workflow that was run.
